description:
Arcade Style Pack includes 2 alternative character styles and a joystick bat. 
Say hello to the newest additions to the rad cast of heroes. Choose between Glitch or Turbo as you head out into the devastated wastelands while rockinâ€™ the freshest arcade-styled gear in the Fallow. Also don't forget to grab that awesome JoyStick Bat that has sweet pixel powers behind its attacks.
name: RAD - Arcade Style Pack
